summary.value: I need only one eye for my own justice

system.description:
Class: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.classes.q7ak4N89Makw4jiJ]{Rogue}

An eyepatch you have adopted to wearing. @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.guides.prZlqZpAy69UrhEt]{Masterwork}

Qualities

  1. Panache: When you reappear in a scene after having used @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.cHKzZJBYjwLuRfDL]{See You Later} you do so with a flair for the dramatic. The first check you make gains +4 bonus. If you do this in a conflict and have @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.tiu0D74YNxirN6Tr]{High Speed} it also costs no mind points.

  2. @UUID[Compendium.fu-azure-compendia.character-inventory.ef9OjgazzQT7U4cL]{Vanishing}
